safetyTips: We will contact you to arrange a safe collection time from our mobile. Kitchen. In case of Delivery, our driver we'll be doing a door step delivery, we'll let you know we are there, step back and wave goodbye as you open.
name: IL PAKKERO
description: Il Pakkero is a family run business. We are an innovative Italian street food from a mobile kitchen. We have started trading since July 2019 around the biggest Kent Food Festivals and catering for private events. Our business is based on the tradition of the italian cuisine, researching always the best ingredients and on the passion we put in our job. Available for Delivery or Collection. Order via our website.
